weekly_top_story.headline: US forces capture Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro in surprise raid
weekly_top_story.summary: US military conducted a surprise operation leading to the ouster and capture of Nicolás Maduro, escalating US intervention in Venezuela amid its oil reserves and regional instability, potentially reshaping Latin American geopolitics.

stories.headline: Trump says he may punish countries with tariffs if they don't back the US controlling Greenland
stories.summary: US President Trump threatens tariffs on nations opposing American control over Greenland, intensifying diplomatic tensions with Denmark and highlighting strategic Arctic interests amid global power shifts.

stories.headline: South Africa investigates Iran's participation in naval drills off its coast after US criticism
stories.summary: South Africa probes Iranian warships' involvement in joint naval exercises following US objections, underscoring rising tensions in international military cooperation and potential impacts on global alliances.
